name: TileVania (Socratic Gaming)
description:
Did this as part of my course. I added some stuff to it like bouncing on enemies and mushrooms and stuff. couple of sprites are mine too. Limited sound effects atm.
Minor physics issues sometimes that I didn't bother correcting.
Warning, the game gets hard.
I didn't put a start screen or an end screen so when you get to the end of lv 3 (if you can get there) you'll just be staring at an empty space with some coins.
